titleStmt.title: Saturday April 22. 1654. By the Council at White-Hall. Whereas a peace is made, concluded, and ratified, between His Highness the Lord Protector, and the States General of the United Provinces of the Low Countries. ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Will. du-Gard and Hen. Hills, printers to his Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening line of text.
Order to print dated: Saturday April 22. 1654. Signed: W. Jessop Clerk of the Council.
Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1946 as Wing (2nd ed.) E2918.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts), and the Bodleian Library (Early English books, 1641-1700).
